description: This intensive January term course empowers students to design a career path rooted in self-awareness and adaptability. Through a blend of introspective exercises, hands-on workshops, and real-world simulations, participants uncover their core values, strengths, and passions while learning to articulate their unique value in the evolving business and professional landscapes. Not open to first year students. Prerequisite: sophomore standing or above.
name: Business Career Compass
